segments.text: Welcome to the human race. Do you think this is what I had planned?
Do you think that when I proposed I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road
We didn't up arguing on a beach over some fish

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, welcome to the human race.  Do you think this is what I had planned?  Do you think that when I proposed that I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road we would end up arguing on the beach over some fish?
